terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.metaDescription: Terms and conditions for using TradeIQ Pro's AI-powered trading platform and services.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By accessing and using TradeIQ Pro, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement between you and INGENIO FINANCIERO DIGITAL, S.A.P.I. DE C.V. ("TradeIQ Pro", "we", "us", or "our").

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content:
TradeIQ Pro is an AI-powered trading analysis platform that provides market insights, technical analysis, and educational resources. Our service includes real-time market data, pattern recognition, trend analysis, and trading recommendations.

The platform is designed for educational and informational purposes to assist traders in making informed decisions. We do not provide financial advice or guarantee trading results.

userObligations.title: 3. User Obligations
userObligations.content:
You agree to use TradeIQ Pro only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

You must provide accurate and complete information when creating your account and keep this information updated. You agree not to share your account with others or allow unauthorized access.

prohibitedUses.title: 4. Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.content:
You may not use our service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. Prohibited activities include but are not limited to:

• Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems
• Distributing malware or harmful code
• Engaging in fraudulent activities
• Violating intellectual property rights
• Harassing or threatening other users
• Using the service for market manipulation

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
The TradeIQ Pro platform, including all content, features, and functionality, is owned by INGENIO FINANCIERO DIGITAL, S.A.P.I. DE C.V. and is protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use our service for personal use only. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works based on our content without explicit written permission.

limitationLiability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content:
TradeIQ Pro provides information and analysis tools but does not guarantee the accuracy of market data or the success of trading decisions. Trading involves substantial risk of loss, and you should carefully consider your financial situation before engaging in trading activities.

We shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our service. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid for our services in the preceding 12 months.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications to Terms
modifications.content:
TradeIQ Pro reserves the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify users of significant changes through our platform or via email. Continued use of our service after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically for changes.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content:
Either party may terminate this agreement at any time. TradeIQ Pro reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in prohibited activities.

Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately, and we may delete your account data in accordance with our data retention policies.

governingLaw.title: 9. Governing Law
governingLaw.content:
These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Mexico. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved in the competent courts of Mexico.

If any provision of these terms is found to be unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Learn how TradeIQ Pro collects, uses, and protects your personal data and privacy.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content:
At TradeIQ Pro, we respect and protect your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered trading platform.

By using our service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We are committed to ensuring that your privacy is protected and will only use your information as described in this policy.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
dataCollection.content:
We collect several types of information from and about users of our service:

**Personal Information:** Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details you provide when creating an account.

**Usage Data:** Information about how you access and use our service, including your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent on our platform.

**Trading Data:** Your trading preferences, watchlists, and interaction with our AI analysis tools.

**Device Information:** Information about the device you use to access our service, including hardware model, operating system, and mobile network information.

dataUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content:
We use the information we collect to:

• Provide and maintain our service
• Process your account registration and manage your account
• Communicate with you about our service, including updates and support
• Personalize your experience and provide tailored AI recommendations
• Analyze usage patterns to improve our platform
• Detect and prevent fraud or abuse
• Comply with legal obligations
• Send marketing communications (with your consent)

dataSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content:
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy:

**Service Providers:** We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our platform and conducting our business.

**Legal Requirements:** We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.

**Business Transfers:** In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

**Protection of Rights:** We may disclose information to protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users or others.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with small amounts of data that may include an anonymous unique identifier.

We use cookies for:
• Essential website functionality
• Analytics to understand how our service is used
• Personalization of content and advertisements
• Security and fraud prevention

You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our service.

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:

• Encryption of data in transit and at rest
• Regular security assessments and audits
• Access controls and authentication mechanisms
• Employee training on data protection
• Incident response procedures

However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

userRights.title: 7. Your Rights
userRights.content:
You have certain rights regarding your personal information:

**Access:** You can request access to the personal information we hold about you.

**Correction:** You can request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal information.

**Deletion:** You can request deletion of your personal information, subject to certain exceptions.

**Portability:** You can request a copy of your personal information in a structured, machine-readable format.

**Objection:** You can object to the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.

To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.content:
We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

When we no longer need your personal information, we will securely delete or anonymize it. Account data may be retained for a reasonable period after account closure to comply with legal obligations and resolve disputes.

updates.title: 9. Policy Updates
updates.content:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.metaDescription: Learn about how TradeIQ Pro uses cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience.

banner.title: We use cookies
banner.description: We use essential cookies to make our site work. With your consent, we may also use non-essential cookies to improve user experience and analyze website traffic.

preferences.title: Cookie Preferences
preferences.description: Choose which cookies you want to accept. You can change these settings at any time.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services.
essential.note: These cookies are always active as they are essential for the website to function.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies allow us to analyze website traffic and understand how visitors interact with our site. This helps us improve our services.
analytics.purpose3: Improve our services and user experience

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content:
This Cookie Policy explains how TradeIQ Pro uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website or use our services. It explains what these technologies are, why we use them, and your rights to control our use of them.

By continuing to use our website, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy.

whatAreCookies.title: 2. What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content:
Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used by website owners to make their websites work more efficiently and to provide reporting information.

Cookies set by the website owner are called "first-party cookies." Cookies set by parties other than the website owner are called "third-party cookies." Third-party cookies enable third-party features or functionality on or through the website.

typesOfCookies.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.content:
We use different types of cookies for various purposes:

**Session Cookies:** These are temporary cookies that remain in the cookie file of your browser until you leave the site.

**Persistent Cookies:** These cookies remain in the cookie file of your browser for much longer (though how long will depend on the lifetime of the specific cookie).

**First-party Cookies:** These are cookies set by our website directly.

**Third-party Cookies:** These are cookies set by third-party services we use on our website.

essentialCookies.title: 4. Essential Cookies
essentialCookies.content:
These cookies are strictly necessary to provide you with services available through our website and to use some of its features, such as access to secure areas.

Essential cookies include:
• Authentication cookies to identify you when you sign in
• Security cookies to prevent fraudulent use of login credentials
• Session cookies to remember your preferences during your visit
• Load balancing cookies to ensure the website runs smoothly

Because these cookies are strictly necessary to deliver the website, you cannot refuse them without impacting how our site functions.

analyticsCookies.title: 5. Analytics Cookies
analyticsCookies.content:
These cookies collect information that is used to help us understand how our website is being used or how effective our marketing campaigns are, or to help us customize our website for you.

We use analytics cookies to:
• Count visits and traffic sources
• Measure and improve website performance
• Understand which pages are most and least popular
• See how visitors move around the site
• Track user behavior and preferences

These cookies do not identify you personally. All information is collected and reported anonymously.

managingCookies.title: 6. Managing Cookies
managingCookies.content:
You have several options for managing cookies:

**Browser Settings:** Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or delete certain cookies.

**Cookie Consent Tool:** You can use our cookie consent tool to manage your preferences for non-essential cookies.

**Opt-out Links:** For some third-party cookies, you can opt out directly with the service provider.

Please note that if you disable cookies, some features of our website may not function properly.

thirdPartyCookies.title: 7. Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content:
In addition to our own cookies, we may also use various third-party cookies to report usage statistics of the service and deliver advertisements.

Third-party services we use may include:
• Google Analytics for website analytics
• Social media platforms for social sharing features
• Marketing and advertising services

These third parties may use cookies to collect information about your online activities across this and other sites over time for non-advertising purposes.

updates.title: 8. Updates to This Policy
updates.content:
We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes to the cookies we use or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.

We encourage you to review this Cookie Policy regularly to stay informed about our use of cookies and related technologies.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us:
